value:
$nMPID_アルム|If you're grateful to someone, be sure
to tell them before it's too late. Sad to
say, they won't be around forever.

$nMPID_セリカ|I am overjoyed by the good fortune of
having Alm at my side every day. We
were separated for so long...

$nMPID_アルム|So...what kind of present would make
you smile? Wait, wait! I want to try
guessing first. I bet I'll get it!

$nMPID_アルム|You look like you could use a snack.
I'll happily share some of mine with
you. It's cheap, but tasty!

$nMPID_セリカ|We're about to enjoy a banquet, but
Alm won't stop snacking... Can you
help me talk some sense into him?

$nMPID_セリカ|We come bearing a message of amity
from $Nf.

$nMPID_セリカ|People grow stronger when they have
someone to protect. This drive can
bring forth untold power from within.

$nMPID_セリカ|This seems about right. Our reach
ought not exceed our grasp.

$nMPID_アルム|There you are! Oh, but... I forgot
your gift.

$nMPID_アルム|You would bestow this power on us?
Thank you. It makes us happier than
you know.

$nMPID_アルム|Happy Day of Devotion! I'm Alm, and
this pretty lady is Celica. We're here
to enjoy the festivities together!

$nMPID_アルム|Oh, hello, $Nu!$k$pSo many gifts you have there! I can
barely see the top of the pile. You're
one sought-after summoner, eh?$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|I trust you're prepared to carry all of
those home with you. With that said,
I do hope we weren't too late...$k$p$nMPID_アルム|Don't fret, Celica. I'm sure one more
wouldn't topple the pile. Isn't that
right, $Nu?$k$p$nMPID_セリカ|I suppose that's true. Well, then...
Here, with our blessing. We worked
together to pick it out, you know.$k$p$nMPID_アルム|Oh no! Maybe one more was one too
many... Don't worry, though! Once
you unbury yourself, you'll love it!$k$pHere's to many more happy days
together!
でやあっ
あげるよ！
Celica!
Alm!
$nMPID_二人|With love!
$nMPID_二人|Love you, Celica! And I you, Alm!
$nMPID_アルム|This is for you!
$nMPID_セリカ|Take this!
「うわあっ」「きゃあっ！」
I thought we'd make it...
Keep it together!
Take care, OK?

• Let's go, Celica.
• I'm ready.

• What a lovely day.
• Let's try to enjoy it.
Ha ha...

• You've become pretty important to us, you know.
• It's true. Thank you so much for all you do for us.
Sure thing.
Let's deliver.
Which to choose...

$nMPID_セリカ|Hmm, let's see... A hairpin would suit
Mae... And a book for Boey. But what
about Nomah and Genny?$k$pOhh... Picking out Day of Devotion
gifts for everyone is harder than I
thought. I'm running out of time.

$nMPID_アルム|Wow, Celica, you're sending each and
every one of our friends a gift?
Picking them out must be tough.

$nMPID_セリカ|Oh, Alm, don't tell me you're giving
everyone the same gift. Really, you
must put more thought into this!

$nMPID_アルム|There are some truly bountiful
grazing pastures near Ram Village.$k$pI heard the meat raised there is the
most delicious around, so I ordered
us up a true feast!$k$pEveryone's getting STEAK!

$nMPID_セリカ|Oh, I... I see... So we're all getting
steak...

$nMPID_アルム|Not just any steak! It's grass fed! The
Knights of Zofia sang its praises! Well,
Clair called it a brutish gesture…$k$pBut still, everyone— Uh, Celica? Is
everything all right? You look upset.

$nMPID_セリカ|N-no, I'm fine. It's nothing! So,
where's my bounty of... Of the finest
meat this side of Ram Village?

$nMPID_アルム|Oh, uh... You wanted some too? I
can't say I expected that...

$nMPID_セリカ|What do you mean you didn't expect
it? There's nothing for me?

$nMPID_アルム|Well, no, I mean... I, um... There's…
there's no MEAT for you… Close your
eyes for a moment. OK, open them...$k$pI hope you like it. I poured my heart
into making it.

$nMPID_セリカ|A wreath of flowers? Oh, Alm... It's
just like the one I made for you so
long ago.

$nMPID_アルム|I'm glad you remember. I was worried
you might not.

$nMPID_セリカ|Of course I do. Thank you, Alm.
This makes me so happy.
$nMPID_アルム|Happier than a big, juicy steak?

$nMPID_セリカ|OK, enough meat.$k$pOh, but I haven't decided what to
give you in return... I'm sorry, but I
don't have a gift for you yet.

$nMPID_アルム|Well, why not make me another
wreath? I'll be happy to wear
it...this time.

$nMPID_セリカ|Hehe... OK. But under one condition...
We go to the flower patch together.

$nMPID_アルム|You got it, Celica. Let's go now!$k$pHolding hands with you like this sure
brings back memories. Deep down
we haven't changed a bit, huh?

$nMPID_セリカ|No, I suppose we haven't. I love you
so, Alm. We'll be together now and
forever.
